config.name: Mailchimp for Ugly Forms
config.description:
Mailchimp helps you design email newsletters, share them on social networks, integrate with services you already use, and track your results.
With Mailchimp action you can subscribe user(emails) to a mailchimp list(s).
config.help: Email Field contains name of field(s) from which email to be fetched for Mailchimp list subscribe.
config.code:
<form name="form_name" method="POST" action="form_post_url" enctype="multipart/form-data" >

	Primary Email   : <input name="email1" type="text" />

	Alternate Email : <input name="email2" type="text" />

	                       <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit" />
</form>
